page.title: 19ABOUT THE ESTATES
page.content: {Father Christmas}tours the housing estates during the early part of December collecting for Wellingborough Lions Club. The donations are given to local charities. He arrives on an illuminated sledge, preceded by someone ringing a bell. {The Salvation Army Band}makes occasional visits to the housing estates, playing carols at Christmas and holding outdoor services at other times. Two estates have{community centres, {Glamis Hall}on the Queensway and {Vicarage Farm Community Centre.}These halls can be hired for a range of activities for young and old. Glamis Hall is run by Wellingborough Council and the other is run by a committee of residents and has been built by them with the help of a grant.
